description: You learned how to handle yourself in the cataclysm.  Whether armed or unarmed, you know how to use your wits to stay alive.  Survival is of the highest priority.
initiate: You steady yourself, prepared for the fights ahead.

static_buffs.name: Fluid Motion
static_buffs.description: You've learned to move with a purposeful efficiency.  Movement speed increased by 25% of Intelligence.

onmove_buffs.name: Elusiveness
onmove_buffs.description:
Quick and fluid movements make you harder to catch, and better able to roll with the punches.

+1 Dodge attempts, Dodge skill increased by 25% of Intelligence, bash damage taken reduced by 25% of Intelligence, quicker recovery from knockdowns.
Lasts 3 turns, stacks 2 times.

onhit_buffs.name: Active Defense
onhit_buffs.description:
The best defense is a good offense.

+1 Block attempts, damage blocked increased by 100% of Intelligence.
Lasts 2 turns, stacks 2 times.

onkill_buffs.name: Misdirection
onkill_buffs.description:
The shock and awe of combat gives you an opportunity to slip away.

+2 Block attempts, +2 Dodge attempts, Dodge skill increased by 50% of Intelligence, movement speed increased by 200% of Intelligence, moving generates 1/2 as much noise.
Last 6 turns.

description: You've learned a number of tricks to take advantage of the potential that abandoning your humanity can offer.  Focused on heavy, powerful weapons or mutant limbs, a supernaturally strong post-human can use their abilities to great effect.
initiate: Your loosen your footwork and let your instincts take over.

static_buffs.name: Large And In Charge
static_buffs.description:
Your stance makes better use of your might to compensate for poor footwork.
Accuracy increased by 15% of strength, -10% move cost.

onpause_buffs.name: Stored Potential
onpause_buffs.description:
Conserving your energy and focusing your mind will permit explosive bursts of action.

-10% move cost.
Lasts 3 turns.

onattack_buffs.name: Tension
onattack_buffs.description:
All you need to survive is to commit to the offensive.

-10% move cost.
Lasts 3 turns, stacks 2 times.

onmove_buffs.name: Bull Rush
onmove_buffs.description:
When you get enough momentum going, they're going to feel it.

Movement speed increased by 45% of strength, bash damage increased by 15% of strength.  Enables "Battering Ram" technique.
Lasts 3 turns, stacks 3 times.

onhit_buffs.name: Brutal Efficiency
onhit_buffs.description:
One powerful blow makes the follow-up that much easier.

+2 Accuracy, bash armor penetration increased by 30% of strength.
Lasts 2 turns, stacks 2 times.
